question: You have seen an advertisement in an Australian magazine for someone tolive with a family for six months and look after their six-year-old child. Write a letter to the parents. In your letter• explain why you would like the job• give details of why you would be a suitable person to employ• say how you would spend your free time while you are in Australia
text: I am writing this letter in reference to the advertisement I have seen in the Aussi Times for a babysitter position. I am a student and ,currently I am doing my master’s degree at  Kingdom university. This is my final semester and probably I will complete my study after six months. Due to some financial issues, I cannot afford to room rent so I am looking for a part-time job. When I saw this advert, I thought this job could be the perfect opportunity for me to earn some money and save on accommodation expenses.

I am the eldest child of my parents and I have three siblings  their ages are 5 years, 8 years, and 12 years  usually during my parent's absence I take care of them, so I have acquired some skills to handle children. Also, when I was studying for my bachelor’s, I worked as a babysitter to look after 3 years boy. I believe my past experience makes me the perfect candidate for this post.

I am not a socialized person, so I do not go out very often with my friend, however, I am a football player and I am keen to play football. When I get some free time from my study, I prefer to call my friend for a match because this game keeps me energetic and active. Sometimes I go to the cinema with my peers and mostly I love to watch ROMCOM genre movies.
My resume is enclosed with this letter for your review. I hope you would find me a suitable applicant for this job.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase currently. Consider adding a comma.
